text: Moscow State University of Geodesy and Cartography () is a university in Russia. It is one of the first universities in the world dedicated to geodesy and cartography. It was established in 1779 and has six faculties. == Other websites == * Moscow State University of Geodesy and Cartography Category:Colleges and universities in Moscow Category:1779 establishments Category:18th-century establishments in Russia Category:1770s establishments in Europe Category:1770s establishments in Asia
title: Moscow State University of Geodesy and Cartography
